title: Defending the Guilty - Truth and Lies in the Criminal Court
description:

Whether heÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s defending hapless teenagers at Harlow Youth Court or prosecuting gold bullion robbers at the Old Bailey, these hair-raising tales reveal that justice rarely operates in quite the way we expect.
